Apex Classes & Triggers.name: All Apex Classes
Apex Classes & Triggers.description: Get all Apex classes with metadata
Apex Classes & Triggers.query: SELECT Id, Name, ApiVersion, Status, LengthWithoutComments, CreatedDate, CreatedBy.Name, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedBy.Name FROM ApexClass ORDER BY Name

Apex Classes & Triggers.name: Recently Modified Apex Classes
Apex Classes & Triggers.description: Apex classes modified in last 7 days
Apex Classes & Triggers.query: SELECT Id, Name, ApiVersion, Status, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedBy.Name FROM ApexClass WHERE LastModifiedDate = LAST_N_DAYS:7 ORDER BY LastModifiedDate DESC

Apex Classes & Triggers.name: Large Apex Classes
Apex Classes & Triggers.description: Find large Apex classes (potential code smell)
Apex Classes & Triggers.query: SELECT Id, Name, LengthWithoutComments, ApiVersion, Status FROM ApexClass WHERE LengthWithoutComments > 2000 ORDER BY LengthWithoutComments DESC

Apex Classes & Triggers.name: Apex Classes by API Version
Apex Classes & Triggers.query: SELECT ApiVersion, COUNT(Id) classCount FROM ApexClass WHERE Status = 'Active' GROUP BY ApiVersion ORDER BY ApiVersion DESC

Apex Classes & Triggers.name: All Apex Triggers
Apex Classes & Triggers.description: List all Apex triggers with their events
Apex Classes & Triggers.query: SELECT Id, Name, TableEnumOrId, Status, ApiVersion, UsageBeforeInsert, UsageAfterInsert, UsageBeforeUpdate, UsageAfterUpdate, UsageBeforeDelete, UsageAfterDelete, UsageAfterUndelete FROM ApexTrigger ORDER BY TableEnumOrId, Name

Apex Classes & Triggers.name: Active Triggers by Object
Apex Classes & Triggers.query: SELECT TableEnumOrId, COUNT(Id) triggerCount FROM ApexTrigger WHERE Status = 'Active' GROUP BY TableEnumOrId ORDER BY COUNT(Id) DESC

Apex Classes & Triggers.name: Inactive Apex Code
Apex Classes & Triggers.description: Find inactive Apex classes and triggers
Apex Classes & Triggers.query: SELECT Id, Name, Status, LastModifiedDate FROM ApexClass WHERE Status = 'Inactive' ORDER BY LastModifiedDate DESC

Apex Test Coverage.name: Overall Code Coverage
Apex Test Coverage.description: Get overall org code coverage percentage

Apex Test Coverage.name: Class Coverage Details
Apex Test Coverage.query: SELECT ApexClassOrTrigger.Name, NumLinesCovered, NumLinesUncovered, Coverage FROM ApexCodeCoverageAggregate ORDER BY ApexClassOrTrigger.Name

Apex Test Coverage.name: Low Coverage Classes
Apex Test Coverage.query: SELECT ApexClassOrTrigger.Name, NumLinesCovered, NumLinesUncovered, Coverage FROM ApexCodeCoverageAggregate WHERE Coverage < 0.75 ORDER BY Coverage

Apex Test Coverage.name: Uncovered Classes
Apex Test Coverage.query: SELECT ApexClassOrTrigger.Name, NumLinesCovered, NumLinesUncovered FROM ApexCodeCoverageAggregate WHERE NumLinesCovered = 0 ORDER BY ApexClassOrTrigger.Name

Apex Test Coverage.name: Test Classes
Apex Test Coverage.query: SELECT Id, Name, ApiVersion, LengthWithoutComments FROM ApexClass WHERE Name LIKE '%Test%' OR Name LIKE '%\_Test' ORDER BY Name

Apex Logs & Debug.name: Recent Apex Logs
Apex Logs & Debug.query: SELECT Id, Application, DurationMilliseconds, Location, LogLength, LogUser.Name, Operation, Request, StartTime, Status FROM ApexLog ORDER BY StartTime DESC LIMIT 100

Apex Logs & Debug.name: Failed Apex Logs
Apex Logs & Debug.query: SELECT Id, Application, LogUser.Name, Operation, StartTime, Status, DurationMilliseconds FROM ApexLog WHERE Status != 'Success' ORDER BY StartTime DESC

Apex Logs & Debug.name: Long Running Operations
Apex Logs & Debug.query: SELECT Id, Application, LogUser.Name, Operation, StartTime, DurationMilliseconds FROM ApexLog WHERE DurationMilliseconds > 5000 ORDER BY DurationMilliseconds DESC

Apex Logs & Debug.name: Logs by User
Apex Logs & Debug.query: SELECT LogUser.Name, COUNT(Id) logCount FROM ApexLog WHERE StartTime = TODAY GROUP BY LogUser.Name ORDER BY COUNT(Id) DESC

Validation Rules.name: All Validation Rules
Validation Rules.description: List all validation rules across objects
Validation Rules.query: SELECT Id, ValidationName, EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, Active, Description, ErrorMessage FROM ValidationRule ORDER BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, ValidationName

Validation Rules.name: Active Validation Rules
Validation Rules.query: SELECT Id, ValidationName, EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, Description, ErrorMessage FROM ValidationRule WHERE Active = true ORDER BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName

Validation Rules.name: Validation Rules by Object
Validation Rules.query: SELECT EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, COUNT(Id) ruleCount FROM ValidationRule WHERE Active = true GROUP BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName ORDER BY COUNT(Id) DESC

Validation Rules.name: Recently Modified Validation Rules
Validation Rules.description: Validation rules changed in last 30 days
Validation Rules.query: SELECT Id, ValidationName, EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, Active, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedBy.Name FROM ValidationRule WHERE LastModifiedDate = LAST_N_DAYS:30 ORDER BY LastModifiedDate DESC

Custom Fields & Objects.name: Custom Fields
Custom Fields & Objects.query: SELECT Id, DeveloperName, EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, DataType, Length, IsNullable, IsUnique, Description FROM FieldDefinition WHERE IsCustom = true ORDER BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, DeveloperName

Custom Fields & Objects.name: Required Custom Fields
Custom Fields & Objects.query: SELECT Id, DeveloperName, EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, DataType, Description FROM FieldDefinition WHERE IsCustom = true AND IsNullable = false ORDER BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName

Custom Fields & Objects.name: Custom Objects
Custom Fields & Objects.query: SELECT Id, QualifiedApiName, Label, PluralLabel, IsCustomSetting, Description FROM EntityDefinition WHERE IsCustomizable = true AND QualifiedApiName LIKE '%__c' ORDER BY QualifiedApiName

Custom Fields & Objects.name: Field Types by Object
Custom Fields & Objects.query: SELECT EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, DataType, COUNT(Id) fieldCount FROM FieldDefinition WHERE IsCustom = true GROUP BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, DataType ORDER BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, COUNT(Id) DESC

Custom Fields & Objects.name: Long Text Fields
Custom Fields & Objects.description: Find long text and rich text fields
Custom Fields & Objects.query: SELECT Id, DeveloperName, EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, DataType, Length FROM FieldDefinition WHERE DataType IN ('LongTextArea', 'Html') ORDER BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName

Custom Fields & Objects.name: Lookup and Master-Detail Fields
Custom Fields & Objects.query: SELECT Id, DeveloperName, EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName, DataType, ReferenceTo.QualifiedApiName FROM FieldDefinition WHERE DataType IN ('Lookup', 'MasterDetail') ORDER BY EntityDefinition.QualifiedApiName

Flows & Process Builder.name: Active Flows
Flows & Process Builder.query: SELECT Id, MasterLabel, DeveloperName, ProcessType, TriggerType, ActiveVersionId, LastModifiedDate FROM FlowDefinitionView WHERE IsActive = true ORDER BY MasterLabel

Flows & Process Builder.name: Flows by Type
Flows & Process Builder.query: SELECT ProcessType, COUNT(Id) flowCount FROM FlowDefinitionView WHERE IsActive = true GROUP BY ProcessType ORDER BY COUNT(Id) DESC

Flows & Process Builder.name: Auto-launched Flows
Flows & Process Builder.query: SELECT Id, MasterLabel, ProcessType, TriggerType, ActiveVersionId FROM FlowDefinitionView WHERE IsActive = true AND ProcessType = 'AutoLaunchedFlow' ORDER BY MasterLabel

Flows & Process Builder.name: Record-Triggered Flows
Flows & Process Builder.query: SELECT Id, MasterLabel, TriggerType, ActiveVersionId, LastModifiedDate FROM FlowDefinitionView WHERE IsActive = true AND ProcessType = 'Workflow' ORDER BY MasterLabel

Flows & Process Builder.name: Screen Flows
Flows & Process Builder.query: SELECT Id, MasterLabel, DeveloperName, ActiveVersionId, Description FROM FlowDefinitionView WHERE IsActive = true AND ProcessType = 'Flow' ORDER BY MasterLabel

Permissions & Security.name: Permission Sets
Permissions & Security.query: SELECT Id, Name, Label, Description, Type, IsOwnedByProfile FROM PermissionSet WHERE IsOwnedByProfile = false ORDER BY Label

Permissions & Security.name: Permission Set Assignments
Permissions & Security.query: SELECT Assignee.Name, Assignee.Username, PermissionSet.Name, PermissionSet.Label FROM PermissionSetAssignment WHERE PermissionSet.IsOwnedByProfile = false ORDER BY Assignee.Name

Permissions & Security.name: Object Permissions
Permissions & Security.description: CRUD permissions for a specific permission set
Permissions & Security.query: SELECT SobjectType, PermissionsCreate, PermissionsRead, PermissionsEdit, PermissionsDelete, PermissionsViewAllRecords, PermissionsModifyAllRecords FROM ObjectPermissions WHERE ParentId = '0PS...' ORDER BY SobjectType

Permissions & Security.name: Field Permissions
Permissions & Security.description: Field-level security for a permission set
Permissions & Security.query: SELECT SobjectType, Field, PermissionsRead, PermissionsEdit FROM FieldPermissions WHERE ParentId = '0PS...' ORDER BY SobjectType, Field

Permissions & Security.name: Profiles
Permissions & Security.query: SELECT Id, Name, UserType, Description, CreatedDate FROM Profile ORDER BY Name

Permissions & Security.name: User Permissions
Permissions & Security.description: System permissions for a permission set
Permissions & Security.query: SELECT Parent.Label, PermissionsApiEnabled, PermissionsManageUsers, PermissionsModifyAllData, PermissionsViewAllData, PermissionsEditTask FROM PermissionSet WHERE Id = '0PS...'

Metadata Deployment.name: Recent Deployments
Metadata Deployment.query: SELECT Id, Status, StartDate, CompletedDate, CreatedBy.Name, NumberComponentsDeployed, NumberComponentErrors FROM AsyncApexJob WHERE JobType = 'ApexDeploy' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 50

Metadata Deployment.name: Failed Deployments
Metadata Deployment.query: SELECT Id, Status, StartDate, CompletedDate, CreatedBy.Name, NumberComponentErrors, NumberTestErrors FROM AsyncApexJob WHERE JobType = 'ApexDeploy' AND Status = 'Failed' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC

Metadata Deployment.name: Running Async Jobs
Metadata Deployment.query: SELECT Id, JobType, Status, CreatedBy.Name, CreatedDate FROM AsyncApexJob WHERE Status IN ('Processing', 'Preparing', 'Queued') ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC

Email Templates & Letterheads.name: Email Templates
Email Templates & Letterheads.query: SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, Subject, IsActive, TemplateType, Folder.Name FROM EmailTemplate ORDER BY Name

Email Templates & Letterheads.name: Active Email Templates
Email Templates & Letterheads.query: SELECT Id, Name, Subject, TemplateType, Folder.Name, LastModifiedDate FROM EmailTemplate WHERE IsActive = true ORDER BY Folder.Name, Name

Email Templates & Letterheads.name: Visual Force Email Templates
Email Templates & Letterheads.query: SELECT Id, Name, Subject, Markup FROM EmailTemplate WHERE TemplateType = 'visualforce' ORDER BY Name

Workflow & Automation.name: Workflow Rules
Workflow & Automation.query: SELECT Id, Name, TableEnumOrId FROM WorkflowRule ORDER BY TableEnumOrId, Name

Workflow & Automation.name: Workflow Field Updates
Workflow & Automation.query: SELECT Id, Name, Field, LiteralValue FROM WorkflowFieldUpdate ORDER BY Name

Workflow & Automation.name: Workflow Email Alerts
Workflow & Automation.query: SELECT Id, Name, Description FROM WorkflowAlert ORDER BY Name

Custom Metadata & Settings.name: Custom Metadata Types
Custom Metadata & Settings.query: SELECT Id, QualifiedApiName, Label, Description FROM EntityDefinition WHERE IsCustomizable = true AND QualifiedApiName LIKE '%__mdt' ORDER BY QualifiedApiName

Custom Metadata & Settings.name: Custom Settings
Custom Metadata & Settings.query: SELECT Id, QualifiedApiName, Label, IsCustomSetting FROM EntityDefinition WHERE IsCustomSetting = true ORDER BY QualifiedApiName

Reports & Dashboards.name: All Reports
Reports & Dashboards.description: List all reports in the org
Reports & Dashboards.query: SELECT Id, Name, DeveloperName, LastRunDate, FolderName, Format FROM Report ORDER BY LastRunDate DESC NULLS LAST

Reports & Dashboards.name: Recently Run Reports
Reports & Dashboards.query: SELECT Id, Name, LastRunDate, FolderName FROM Report WHERE LastRunDate = LAST_N_DAYS:30 ORDER BY LastRunDate DESC

Reports & Dashboards.name: Reports by Folder
Reports & Dashboards.query: SELECT FolderName, COUNT(Id) reportCount FROM Report GROUP BY FolderName ORDER BY COUNT(Id) DESC

Lightning Components.name: Aura Components
Lightning Components.query: SELECT Id, DeveloperName, MasterLabel, ApiVersion, Description FROM AuraDefinitionBundle ORDER BY DeveloperName

Lightning Components.name: Lightning Web Components
Lightning Components.query: SELECT Id, DeveloperName, MasterLabel, ApiVersion, Description FROM LightningComponentBundle ORDER BY DeveloperName

Lightning Components.name: Recently Modified Components
Lightning Components.query: SELECT Id, DeveloperName, MasterLabel, LastModifiedDate FROM LightningComponentBundle WHERE LastModifiedDate = LAST_N_DAYS:30 ORDER BY LastModifiedDate DESC

Static Resources.name: All Static Resources
Static Resources.query: SELECT Id, Name, ContentType, BodyLength, CacheControl, LastModifiedDate FROM StaticResource ORDER BY Name

Static Resources.name: Large Static Resources
Static Resources.query: SELECT Id, Name, ContentType, BodyLength, LastModifiedDate FROM StaticResource WHERE BodyLength > 1048576 ORDER BY BodyLength DESC

Custom Labels & Tabs.name: Custom Labels
Custom Labels & Tabs.description: All custom labels in the org
Custom Labels & Tabs.query: SELECT Id, Name, Value, Language, Category FROM ExternalString ORDER BY Category, Name

Custom Labels & Tabs.name: Custom Tabs
Custom Labels & Tabs.query: SELECT Id, Name, Label, SobjectName FROM CustomTab ORDER BY Label
